mapper.select: select a.car_number AS "cartId", a.create_time AS "timemills", a.comid from ${tableName} a where a.create_time > #{create_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.groupid= #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.state = 0 and a.ishd = 0 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC limit 10

select a.car_number AS "cartId", a.end_time AS "timemills", a.comid from ${tableName} a
where a.end_time > #{create_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.groupid= #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.state =1
and a.ishd = 0 ORDER BY a.end_time DESC limit 10

select COALESCE(sum(a.cash_pay+a.electronic_pay+a.cash_prepay+a.electronic_prepay),0) AS "total" , a.comid from ${tableName} a where a.end_time > #{end_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.groupid= #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.ishd = 0
and a.out_uid>-1 GROUP BY a.comid ORDER BY total desc limit 5
select COALESCE(sum(a.parking_total),0) AS "parkingtotal" from com_info_tb a where a.groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.state = 0
select a.id parkid, a.company_name AS "parkName" from com_info_tb a where a.groupid= #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.state = 0
select a.login_time logintime, a.beat_time beattime, a.local_id AS "localid" from park_token_tb a where a.park_id= #{parkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.login_time desc

select a.uin uin, a.out_channel_id passid, a.resume reason, a.ctime ctime from lift_rod_tb a left join com_info_tb b ON a.comid = b.id where b.groupid= #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.ctime>#{ctime,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY a.ctime desc;

select a.car_number AS "cartId", a.create_time AS "timemills", a.in_passid AS "parkName" from ${tableName} a where a.create_time > #{create_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.comid= #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.state = 0 and a.ishd = 0 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC limit 10

select a.car_number AS "cartId", a.end_time AS "timemills", a.out_passid AS "parkName" from ${tableName} a where a.end_time > #{create_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.comid = #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.state in(1,2) and a.ishd = 0 ORDER BY a.end_time DESC limit 10

select COALESCE(sum(a.cash_pay+a.electronic_pay+a.cash_prepay+a.electronic_prepay),0) AS "total", a.out_uid uid from ${tableName} a where a.comid = #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.end_time > #{end_time,jdbcType=BIGINT} and out_uid <> -1 and a.ishd = 0 group by a.out_uid ORDER BY total desc limit 5
select COALESCE(sum(a.parking_total),0) AS "parkingtotal" from com_info_tb a where a.id= #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.state= 0
select a.nickname nickname from user_info_tb a where a.id= #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} limit 1
SELECT company_name as name FROM com_info_tb WHERE ID = #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and state = 0
SELECT empty FROM com_info_tb WHERE ID = #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and state = 0

SELECT COUNT (*) FROM carower_product WHERE com_id = #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
ANd is_delete=0
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM ticket_tb WHERE comid = #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND create_time > #{create_time,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM visitor_tb WHERE comid = #{comid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND STATE = 0
